other_tests.findings: Histological diagnosis of multifocal gastric GIST and impaction of paraaortic paraganglioma.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Multifocal gastric GIST and paraganglioma discovered in the second patient, but no changes over time are specified.

other_tests.findings: Resection of multiple paraaortic paragangliomas and adrenal cortical adenoma in patient one; resection of chondromas in patient two.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Patient one underwent several resections at different ages, with tumors recurrently appearing, while patient two has continued to have asymptomatic pulmonary chondromas.

other_tests.date: Age 29 for one patient, age 48 for another
other_tests.findings: Discovery of juxtaadrenal paragangliomas and unilateral pheochromocytoma during surgery.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Subclinical Cushing syndrome was confirmed biochemically in one patient postoperatively.

other_tests.findings: Presence of esophageal leiomyomas, usually small and asymptomatic.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Some lesions remained asymptomatic for years, as seen in reported patients.
